languages.text: "За предательство веры я отлучаю тебя от света Императора и нарекаю мерзостью! А теперь умри, еретик".
"For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."
languages.original_text: "За предательство веры я отлучаю тебя от света Императора и нарекаю мерзостью! А теперь умри, еретик".

traits.locale_text: "For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an anathema! And now — die, heretic."
"For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an anathema! And now — die, heretic."
"For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."
"For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an anathema! And now — die, heretic."
"For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."
"For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an anathema! And now — die, heretic."
"For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."
"For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."
"For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."

languages.text: "Für den Verrat am Glauben exkommuniziere ich Euch hiermit vom Licht des Imperators und benenne Euch als Abscheulichkeit! Und jetzt ... sterbt, Ketzer!"
languages.original_text: "For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."

traits.locale_text: "Für den Verrat am Glauben exkommuniziere ich Euch hiermit vom Licht des Imperators und benenne Euch als Abscheulichkeit! Und jetzt ... sterbt, Ketzer!"
"Für den Verrat am Glauben exkommuniziere ich Euch hiermit vom Licht des Imperators und benenne Euch als Anathema! Und jetzt ... sterbt, Ketzer!"

languages.text: « Pour avoir trahi la foi, je vous excommunie de la lumière de l'Empereur et vous nomme abomination ! Et maintenant, mourez, hérétique. »
languages.original_text: "For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."

traits.locale_text: « Pour avoir trahi la foi, je vous excommunie de la lumière de l'Empereur et vous nomme abomination ! Et maintenant, mourez, hérétique. »
« Pour avoir trahi la foi, je vous excommunie de la lumière de l'Empereur et vous nomme anathème ! Et maintenant, mourez, hérétique. »

languages.text: «Por traicionar la fe, queda excomulgado de la luz del Emperador: ¡le nombro abominación! Y ahora, muera, hereje».
languages.original_text: "For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."

traits.locale_text: «Por traicionar la fe, queda excomulgado de la luz del Emperador: ¡le nombro abominación! Y ahora, muera, hereje».
«Por traicionar la fe, queda excomulgado de la luz del Emperador: ¡le nombro anatema! Y ahora, muera, hereje».

languages.text: 「信仰への背信行為により、皇帝陛下の御光よりお前を破門し、忌まわしきものとする！そして今…死ね、異端者め」
languages.original_text: "For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."

traits.locale_text: 「信仰への背信行為により、皇帝陛下の御光よりお前を破門し、忌まわしきものとする！そして今…死ね、異端者め」
「信仰への背信行為により、皇帝陛下の御光よりお前を破門し、アナテマとする！そして今…死ね、異端者め」

languages.text: “你背叛了信仰，我将你驱离帝皇的明光，宣判你为怪物！我在此进行审判，受死吧，异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."

traits.locale_text: “你背叛了信仰，我将你驱离帝皇的明光，宣判你为怪物！我在此进行审判，受死吧，异端分子。”
“你背叛了信仰，我将你逐出帝皇的明光，宣判你为怪物！我在此进行审判，受死吧，异端分子。”

languages.text: "İnanca ihanet ettiğin için seni İmparator'un ışığından sürüyorum ve bir canavar ilan ediyorum! Şimdi ölme zamanı kâfir."
languages.original_text: "For betraying the faith, I hereby excommunicate you from the Emperor's light and name you an abomination! And now — die, heretic."
